tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE suppliers (
  supplier_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  supplier_name STRING,
  address STRING,
  phone_number STRING,
  email STRING,
  registration_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE Products (
    product_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    price DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
    supplier_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (supplier_id) REFERENCES Suppliers(supplier_id)
);

CREATE TABLE suppliers (
    supplier_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    supplier_name STRING NOT NULL,
    contact_person STRING,
    country STRING,
    is_approved BOOL
);

CREATE TABLE supplier_contacts (
    contact_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    supplier_id UUID REFERENCES suppliers(supplier_id),
    contact_name STRING NOT NULL,
    email STRING,
    phone_number STRING
);

CREATE TABLE supplier_products (
    product_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    supplier_id UUID REFERENCES suppliers(supplier_id),
    product_name STRING NOT NULL,
    price DECIMAL,
    quantity INT
);

CREATE TABLE supplier_certifications (
    certification_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    supplier_id UUID REFERENCES suppliers(supplier_id),
    certification_name STRING NOT NULL,
    certification_date DATE,
    expiration_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE suppliers (
  supplier_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  supplier_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  country VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  contact_person VARCHAR(50),
  email VARCHAR(50) UNIQUE
)

CREATE TABLE products (
  product_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  product_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  supplier_id INT NOT NULL,
  price DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
  CONSTRAINT fk_supplier_id FOREIGN KEY (supplier_id) REFERENCES suppliers(supplier_id)
)

CREATE TABLE certifications (
  certification_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  certification_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  certification_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE product_certifications (
  product_id INT,
  certification_id INT,
  issue_date DATE,
  expiration_date DATE,
  CONSTRAINT pk_product_certifications PRIMARY KEY (product_id, certification_id),
  CONSTRAINT fk_product_id FOREIGN KEY (product_id) REFERENCES products(product_id),
  CONSTRAINT fk_certification_id FOREIGN KEY (certification_id) REFERENCES certifications(certification_id)
)

CREATE TABLE regulatory_requirements (
  requirement_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  requirement_title VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  description TEXT
)
